revision.comment: /* top */clean up, replaced: hynix → SK hynix (2), SK SK hynix → SK hynix (2)

}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "GRANV5.FU25N-B3_NF" and "REV:1.0" is silkscreened on the board. <!-- SGE: GRANV5.JU10-32-C3, GAN5.GZ56T-B, GUN5.7U10-27-4, AP699E9N3.9U31H-4300M -->
:• CPU: [[Broadcom]] BCM63283KFBG :• WLAN: [[Broadcom]] BCM4313KML1G
